00028     IT_OpenStart=1,

00041 class OPENRAVE_API SpaceSamplerBase :  public InterfaceBase
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     SpaceSamplerBase(EnvironmentBasePtr penv) : InterfaceBase(PT_SpaceSampler, penv) {
00045     }
00046     virtual ~SpaceSamplerBase() {
00047     }
00048 
00050     static inline InterfaceType GetInterfaceTypeStatic() {
00051         return PT_SpaceSampler;
00052     }
00053 
00055     virtual void SetSeed(uint32_t seed) OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00056

00059 
00061     virtual int GetDOF() const = 0;
00062

00069 
00070     virtual bool Supports(SampleDataType type) const = 0;

00076 
00080     virtual void GetLimits(std::vector<uint32_t>& vLowerLimit, std::vector<uint32_t>& vUpperLimit) const OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00081 
00089     virtual void SampleSequence(std::vector<dReal>& samples, size_t num=1,IntervalType interval=IT_Closed) OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00090 
00097     virtual void SampleSequence(std::vector<uint32_t>& sample, size_t num=1) OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00098 
00102     virtual void SampleComplete(std::vector<dReal>& samples, size_t num,IntervalType interval=IT_Closed) OPENRAVE_DUMMY_IMPLEMENTATION;
00103
